transcript:
Customer: Karpur gauram karuna vatarm
Hello
Hello
Customer: Haan
Customer: Sir India Mart head office se baat kar rahi hu 4 baje connect karne ke liye bola tha aap apne staff se baat kara denge mere
Executive: Achcha achcha ek second ek second
Executive: matlab aap bataiye kiske pass ja raha hai
Executive: Achcha dusre line pe hai wo apna Divya madam apna number bataiye na hum usse call karwa dete hain
Customer: Mere ko aap unka number share kar dijiye main connect kar lungi
Executive: Achcha theek hai
Customer: Boliye
Executive: Bata rahe hain
Executive: 85410
Customer: 85410
Executive: 380
Customer: 380
Executive: 56
Customer: Five
Executive: Six
Customer: Six ek second inka good name
Executive: Sir madam Adarsh
Customer: Adarsh sir main ye bol rahi thi ki Google meet ke liye jaise inko Google meet karna tha to abhi main jaise in share karungi join kar payenge na Google meet ko
Executive: Haan usko bata dijiyega na baat kar lijiyega
Customer: To abhi main call karungi
Executive: Madam ye kab kab se ye mera start startup date hai ye
Customer: Start sir September se start hai
Executive: September se start kar diye
Customer: Haan ji maine aapko connect bhi kara tha aapne bola tha Durga Puja ke baad fir aapne Chhat Puja ke baad ab ye November chal raha hai
Executive: October se na bole the madam jo ye Adarsh jo kaam kar rahe hain wo trend ho jayega usko training de dijiyega ek bar tab start kijiyega
Customer: Sir aise nahi maine aapko bola tha ki sir service live ho chuki hai aapki aapko connect bhi kara tha aapne bola mam aap hi call answer bhi nahi kar rahe the main maine aapke profile dekhi starting se jab aapki service live hui thi mere pass hi aayi thi aapki
Executive: To usme abhi kuch cutting karana tha kuch na usme
Customer: Kya cutting karana tha kis mein
Executive: Jaise wo sirf solar ka hi usme dalwana tha
Customer: Achcha catalog mein
Executive: Haan catalog mein jo hum bole nahi the jo bhi kaam hoga start hoga jo ladka training mein hai usko training de dijiyega uske baad start kijiyega
Customer: Wo to sir dekhiye hamare end me nahi hota na backend team se hota hai aapki service live hone ke baad hi mere pass aayi thi
Executive: To ladke ko bhi to samjha ke live karna tha na waise khali khali aap live kar di fir fayda kya hua
Executive: Utna to loss ho gaya na utna bas samay to
Customer: Sir jab aapka matlab jab aap aapki jab baat hui hogi India Mart tab aapne batana tha ki nahi live karna hai mere ko services kyuki service live hone ke baad mere pass aapki company aayi uske baad to sir mere hath mein koi cheez tha bhi nahi
Executive: Achcha wo dekh lijiyega agar hota hai to karwa dijiyega usko
Customer: Usme sir dekhiye hota nahi hai main aapko pehle hi bata du main kyu aapko bolu dekhti hu kyuki jo mere ko pata hai jo cheez nahi hoti hai jo aapka service ka count hai wo wahin se rehta hai but sir main ye puchna chah rahi thi aap matlab jaise India Mart se aap pehli bar aa rahe hain aa rahe hain right
Executive: Ji
Customer: To isse pehle koi aur bhi online platform pe ya fir isse pehle offline hi deal kar rahe the
Executive: Nahi nahi India Mart pe to pehle bhi tha aapka lekin pehle jo hai wo kuch charges wagaira the service ko leke aapka hi hua tha kuch issue jo bataya gaya tha kuch aur hua kuch aur tha
Customer: Achcha
Executive: To baad mein wo bole ki nahi ye aapko jo bataya gaya hai ye galat bataya hai hum pakka nahi denge tabhi jo hai wo deal humne cancel kiya tha pehle wala
Customer: Theek hai okay okay
Executive: Aur abhi abhi madam ye bataiye abhi jo hamara customer aap de rahi hain kitna kya customer aap de rahi hain
Customer: Matlab buyleads aapko kitni mil rahi hai
Executive: Haan buyleads kya de rahi hain aap
Customer: Per week aapko dekhiye milti hai aapko daily milti hai one
Executive: Daily
Customer: Daily one milti hai week basis pe seven milti hai total aapko per week 17 milti hai
Executive: Per week 17
Customer: Haan 17
Executive: To
Customer: Sir aapka ye jo offline business hai aapka ye kab se registered hai
Executive: Kab se
Customer: 2017 se hai aapki company
Executive: To wo to GST jab se lagu hua hoga halaki wo to pehle se tha lekin GST jab se lagu hua tab se hai
Customer: Achcha offline aap matlab kitne saal se handle kar rahe hain naya naya ya aapki purani already bahut purani company hai
Executive: Ye to pehle se hi hai madam 2017 se agar aap dekh pa rahi hain to 2017 se bhi aapka approx 5 3 8 saal hota hai na GST lagu hua tab se
Customer: Haan
Executive: Ji ji
Customer: To sir main ek aur cheez puchungi product line to aapki achchi hai jaise solar panel me aap deal kar rahe hain isme kafi achcha competition hai but sir aap kya all over India deal kar rahe hain ya fir sirf like jo aapki particular location hai ye Motihari isme deal kar rahe hain
Executive: Motihari mein rahega na to same place pe denge to hame costing matlab jo hai customer ko kam girega tabhi wo close ho payega jyada tar aur out of Bihar agar karte hain to fir costing waha girega to party pay nahi karega na transportation expense bhi girta hai plus charges bhi extra costing girega to uske liye costly ho jayega na fir customer ke liye
Customer: Matlab aap Bihar me deal kar rahe hain bas
Executive: Ji ji ji
Customer: Theek hai Bihar ke ha aur bhi yaha pe members hai jin product me aap deal kar rahe ho na jaise maine yaha pe search kara aapka mono fix select solar panel ek company hai yaha par doctor Sanjeev Memorial Seva Sadan Private Limited same client hai Muzaffarpur ke Muzaffarpur aa raha hai agar ye Bihar me bhi deal karta hai to ye inko jante hain aapke competitors hain
Executive: Achcha doctor kya hai doctor
Customer: Doctor Sanjeev Memorial Seva Sadan aur ek aur hai Patna ki jo aapki location pe present hui hai army enterprise hai ye bhi aapke competitors hain ye sare
Executive: Achcha
Customer: Matlab bahut sari companies hai yaha par jo aapki location pe dikh rahi hai aur bahut purane time se deal kar rahe hain aapke hi competitors hain
Executive: Ji
Customer: Wo sare hai sir main wahi dekh rahi hu ki aap log nahi jante aapke competitors hain aapke ki jante hain aapke
Executive: Madam wo to bahut log hain lekin jo hai ab ye khoj pana jo hai matlab samajh pana un logo ko mushkil hai agar hum log competitor ke piche pad jaye to fir
Customer: Main matlab ek cheez main bolna chahungi jaise ki aap matlab aap pehle bhi ek matlab ek do bar aap mere pass isse pehle aap ek bar India Mart pe theek the hai na aapne aapne is time aapne services chlai thi ek month hi chlai hogi income month ka service aapka aapka madam double double aawaz kyu aa raha hai
Customer: Rukiye rukiye ab clear aa gaya
Executive: Ji boliye
Customer: Haan main keh rahi thi aapne usko ek month hi use kara tha 2023 ke time to ab dobara aaye ho to ab jaise aap naye naye aaye ho apni company ko leke wapas isi company ke Champaran hai to yaha pe buyer se puchega ki aap abhi newly add hue ho member hamare theek hai aur sath hi sath aap main ye janna chahungi ki jaise aap jis product line me deal kar rahe ho wo kafi achcha product hai aapka costly hai but achcha product hai isme kafi achcha business ho sakta hai India Mart se iska matlab kafi competition hai India Mart se all over India me baat karo ya fir aapke location me baat karo but sir aap
Executive: Aawaz aawaz madam aapka disturb aa raha hai
Customer: Okay
Customer: Clear aa rahi hai sir ab
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm
Customer: Ab clear aa rahi hai nahi aa rahi hai aap mujhe bataiye
Executive: Hmm haan aa rahi hai pehle se kuch theek hai
Customer: Theek hai to sir main keh rahi thi ki aapne jo services use kari hai ya aap service pe kyu deal kar rahe hain aap itne time baad aap dobara apne online market pe aaye jaise aapko dekhiye offline ho gaya itne saal ho gaya agar main 2017 se bhi dekhi hu to buyer waha pe aapko janta hoga online market me aap new aaye hain at least aapke jo buyer aapke jo competitors hai uske level pe aap aate hain
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Voice aa rahi hai sir
Executive: Voice aapka clear nahi aa raha hai madam
Customer: Main call back karu sir dobara aapko dusra dusra number hai kya usse call back kijiye
Customer: Mera number to yahi hai main aapko ek kaam karti hu aapke is number pe dobara call back karti hu call cut karti hu
Executive: Theek hai madam theek hai theek hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to connect with staff.

- Customer says services started without proper training.

- Customer says the executive is not answering calls.

- Customer wants to cut solar panel in catalog.

- Customer wants to know about competitors.

- Customer says voice is not clear.



Resolution:

- Executive shared staff number.

- Executive said to explain Google Meet to Adarsh.

- Executive said to check about cutting in catalog.

- Executive shared details about buyleads.

- Executive said they only deal in Bihar.

- Executive asked to call back.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, competitors, training
